Ingredients.7: 1 (16 ounce) can whole berry cranberry sauce

Directions.2: Heat oil in a deep-fryer or large saucepan to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).

Directions.3: Pour flour into a bowl. Beat eggs and milk together in a separate bowl. Pour bread crumbs into a third bowl.

Directions.4: Remove cheese from the freezer and cut each round into 6 wedges. Roll each wedge in flour and dip into the egg-milk mixture. Press each wedge into bread crumbs until evenly coated.

Directions.5: Fry each breaded wedge in the hot oil until bread crumbs are browned, 2 to 3 minutes per side. Transfer fried cheese to a paper towel-lined plate using a slotted spoon. Serve cranberry sauce on the side.
